an_account_owner_can: [CY] An account owner can access services for the authorised agent.
view_all_users_who: [CY] view all users who have been added to this account
if_any_of_the_details: [CY] If any of the details we hold about the authorised agent change, an account owner must update the account details. They must do this within 14 days.
a_standard_user_can: [CY] A standard user can access services for the authorised agent.
they_can_also_view_all_users_standard: [CY] They can also view all users who have been added to this account. They cannot add or remove users.
an_administrator_can: [CY] An administrator can access services for the authorised agent.
they_can_also_view_all_users_admin: [CY] They can also view all users who have been added to this account. They can add and remove:
weve_sent_an_email: [CY] We’ve sent an email to tell them you’ve added them
theyll_be_able_to_access: [CY] They’ll be able to access the authorised agent account when they sign in.
